INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_CONTACT_DTL (STR_EMP_NO, GNUM_SLNO_MAIN, STR_CUR_HOUSE_NO, STR_CUR_LOCALITY, NUM_CUR_CITY_ID, NUM_CUR_DIST_ID, NUM_CUR_STATE_ID, STR_CUR_PIN_CODE,NUM_CUR_COUNTRY_ID,STR_PER_HOUSE_NO,STR_PER_LOCALITY,NUM_PER_CITY_ID,NUM_PER_DIST_ID,NUM_PER_STATE_ID,STR_PER_PIN_CODE,NUM_PER_COUNTRY_ID,STR_HOME_TOWN,NUM_HOME_CITY_ID,NUM_HOME_DIST_ID,NUM_HOME_STATE_ID,STR_THAANA,STR_NEAR_RAIL_STATION,NUM_TEL_NO_RESI,NUM_MOBILE_NO,STR_EMAIL_ID,NUM_FAX_NO,NUM_OFF_EXT_NO,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, STR_OTH_HOUSE_NO, STR_OTH_LOCALITY, NUM_OTH_CITY_ID, NUM_OTH_DIST_ID, NUM_OTH_STATE_ID, STR_OTH_PIN_CODE, NUM_OTH_COUNTRY_ID,STR_OTH_REMARKS,STR_PER_ADD_SAME_AS_CUR_ADD, STR_HT_SAME_AS_CUR_OR_PER_ADD) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_EMP_CONTACT_DTL A SET A.NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_STATUS=?,A.DT_VALIDATE_DATE=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_BY=?,A.STR_REMARKS=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO_MAIN=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_EMP_CONTACT_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO_MAIN=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
